actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide that annuity contracts purchased by the Uniformed Services University of the Health Sciences shall be entitled to the benefits of section 403(b) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.

summary.text: Grants tax-exempt status upon an annuity contract purchased by the Uniformed Services University of the Health Sciences for any employee who is a member of the civilian faculty or staff of such university.

titles.title: A bill to provide that annuity contracts purchased by the Uniformed Services University of the Health Sciences shall be entitled to the benefits of section 403(b) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.
